thread.title: Man buys ring for dead girlfriend

title: Man buys ring for dead girlfriend
text: Josh Thompson bought a ring for his girlfriend Abigail Hall after her death and posted engagement on Facebook Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Josh Thompson bought a ring for his girlfriend Abigail Hall after her death and posted engagement on Facebook Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Lost love ... Josh Thompson and Abigail Hall before her untimely death. Picture: Facebook. A HEARTBROKEN boyfriend bought an engagement ring for his girlfriend after her shock death and then posted their engagement on Facebook. Abigail Hall, 18, had just finished her first week of school studying biomedical science when she was found unconscious, The Star reports. Distraught ... Josh Thompson posted this picture of his dead girlfriend Abigail Hallâ€™s hand after he slipped on an engagement ring. Picture: Facebook Her boyfriend, Josh Thompson, 22, was coaching tennis in Greece when he snuck away from a client dinner to Facetime his girlfriend. Other Stories
